segments.text: Over there, I notice the children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly aiming for the cookie jar I can see inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite clever how they've planned this little raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at the boy's agility on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's outstretched hand is a clear signal of her intent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those cookies just by watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their mischievous cooperation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely engrossed in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
